# logflare_endpoint_query (Data Source)

Logflare Endpoint Data source

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "logflare_endpoint_query" "test" {
  name_or_token = logflare_endpoint.endpoint_test.name
}
```

## Schema

### Required

- `name_or_token` (String, Sensitive) Logflare access token

### Read-Only

- `result` (Dynamic) A list of results for your query endpoint.
